column3: お命 ちょうだい する！

もし…旅の方
苦難の相が お顔に出ていらっしゃるようで…
これからの あなたの運勢が知りたければ
ぜひ占ってあげましょう
column4:
Excuse me, young traveler, but if I may
be so bold... You look quite troubled.

Perhaps a glimpse into what your future
holds would bring comfort to your spirit?
That is...may I tell you your fortune?

column3:
では…"心して聞いてください

赤い色が見えます…

それはそれは美しい赤…
column4:
Ahh, very good. Now let me see...


I see...red... A crimson...deep and rich...
It's the most beautiful color I've
ever seen...
Oh! It's the color of your blood!

column3:
それは そうでしょう
知らない方が いいこともありますよね…
column4:
Perhaps that is for the best...
Some things may be better off
left unknown.

column3: 今日が あなたの命日になるなんてね！
column4:
Like...how today is the day your life
is ended!

column3:
相変わらず
苦難の相が お顔に出ていらっしゃるようで…
あなたの運勢が知りたければ
ぜひ占ってあげましょう
column4:
I have to say... Your visage looks just as
troubled as ever. Perhaps a glimpse of
your future will ease your worries?
What do you think? Shall I tell you
your fortune?

column3:
では…"心して聞いてください

黒い色が見えます…

深く深く吸い込まれるような黒…
column4:
Excellent... Now then, let me see...


I see...black. So much blackness...
A deep, dark abyss, drawing you in...

column3: あなたは今日無に帰するのです！
column4: Ah! It's the void you're about to inhabit.
